summary: Defines the core constant values, identifiers, and mapping tables used by the Zigbee Home Automation (ZHA) integration, including cluster IDs, device class classifications, and helper data structures for translating Zigbee attributes to Home Assistant entities.
business_intent: Provide a centralized, authoritative source of constants and mappings so that the ZHA integration can consistently interpret Zigbee clusters, device types, and attributes, enabling reliable device discovery, state handling, and service interaction within Home Assistant.
